# Chamu Pages - Static Website Specialist

## About
High-performance portfolio website for Chamu Pages, specializing in building lightning-fast static websites for Western business owners. Focused on speed, SEO, and conversion optimization.

## Services
- Custom Static Website Development (HTML/CSS/JS)
- Performance Optimization (100/100 Lighthouse Scores)
- SEO-Ready Architecture
- Dark Mode & Responsive Design

## Key Features
- Zero bloat, no heavy frameworks
- Mobile-first approach
- Interactive animations (GSAP, Canvas)

## Contact
- Email: chamu.pages@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/chamudithalanka
